title: Counters
body: Does anybody (or can anybody) please link a trustable website that tells OP champs this patch, counters for champs, and more? thanks :)

replies.body:
[Lolcounters](http://lolcounter.com/) for counters and synergies (although honestly counters don't mean that much if you can't play the champ).


For champion tier lists I would recommend [Nerfplz](http://www.nerfplz.com/). It has competitive tier lists by patch as well as "FOTM popular picks lists".
